nodes.text: Avamarivash was the male leader of a civilization which occupied the city of Kaleth and the site of the ancient Je'daii Order's Temple of Knowledge sometime after the Force Wars on Tython. Known as the Great Warrior Poet, Avamarivash was a large sponsor of the arts and was quite a different leader than his eventual successor Maravada the Silent as he frequently bedded many women and erected monuments to the glory of his people after fighting vicious wars. A history of Avamarivash's reign could be found in the Chamber of Speech in Kaleth up until the Cold War-era and the Jedi Order's return to Tython.
